WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc_srgb.summary: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc_srgb extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes four S3TC compressed texture formats for the sRGB colorspace.

remarks.para: Compressed textures reduce the amount of memory needed to store a texture on the GPU, allowing for higher resolution textures or more of the same resolution textures.
WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is available to both {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} and {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}} contexts.
